channel.title: Pgp on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Pgp on tlake.io

item.title: spring cleaning my digital identity
item.description: I’d been reading up about git-secret and realized that I didn’t really grasp what a PGP key is or how to use one (or more). I’ve had a Keybase account since 2011, and it’s become a bit of a disjointed mess. The addition and revocation of devices makes sense, since I’ve gone through a couple of phones since 2011. However, my usage of PGP keys has been erratic. You see, my nebulous grasp of PGP keys roughly equated them with SSH keys, and so I’d created and revoked a few of them.
